items.name: Monthly Management Fee
items.ourProcess: 8% Gross Rent Collected, only charged when we successfully collect rent
items.industryAverage: Starting at 6% Gross Rent Collected, only charged when we successfully collect rent

items.name: Leasing Fee
items.ourProcess: 50% of one month's rent. Due at lease signing
items.industryAverage: 50% of one month's rent. Due at lease signing

items.name: 24/7 Maintenance Management
items.info: Emergencies don’t wait — neither do we. Our trained in-house techs and approved vendors are available around the clock.

items.name: Lease Renewal Process
items.info: We prepare a market analysis and negotiate a lease renewal with the current resident. We take into account things like current market rate, the quality of the current resident, length of tenancy, and more. We never want to lose a great resident over a rent increase, so we balance rental income with resident retention.
items.ourProcess: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='#1E3A8A' viewBox='0 0 24 24' width='40' height='40'><path d='M9 16.2l-3.5-3.5 1.4-1.4L9 13.4l7.1-7.1 1.4 1.4z'/></svg>

items.info: If we place a tenant and they break their lease during the first 6 months - we will release the property with no leasing fee charge

items.name: Rent Deposit Guarantee
items.info: We know you want your money fast! So we ACH your tenant rent into your bank account by the 15th day of each month

items.name: Management Fee Guarantee
items.info: We believe that if we can't collect the rent - then we should NOT get paid. You only pay us a management fee if we successfully collect the rent due

items.name: Leasing Fee Guarantee
items.info: You don't pay us a leasing fee until we have a signed lease AND money paid from the tenant

items.name: One Contact & Response Time Guarantee
items.info: As an owner-client you will have one direct point of contact (your Executive Property Manager) and we promise to return all communication within 24 hours business hours

items.name: Utility Administration & Management
items.info: We manage & monitor property utilities including service and billing transfers in and out of tenants names as necessary.
items.ourProcess: $30 per vacant transfer
items.industryAverage: $25 per vacant transfer

items.name: Legal Compliance Guarantee
items.info: Our lease agreement is reviewed and approved by our local New Jersey Attorney.  We operate in compliance with fair housing, habitability, application screening, and right-to-cure laws.
